title: Who's going to win Worlds
body: Even though I am a SKT fan. I believe Longzhu Gaming is going to win Worlds 2017. I believe that SKT has been in a declining state and "unless" they win by overwhelming margins in the games leading up to the finals. So unless SKT step it up Longzhu will crush the finals because they crushed their brackets and the LCK summer split. Now I am a big fan of the LCK, but I am bot saying that every other team is out of the tournament. RNG could possibly beat SKT in the semi finals or any other team could get lucky. That is my personal opinion of what will happen in the tournament please tell me who you think will win Worlds 2017

replies.body:
I'd love to see another SKT championship, been a fan since I first watched Worlds in Season 3.

That said, I wouldn't be surprised or too disappointed if LZ stays on top and takes it all.

If I'm rooting for any upset, it'd be the China special, RNG and WE beating the Koreans in Semis and going to Finals.
Yeah I just don't know if SKT can win another finals against Longzhu.
but longzhu won't make it to finals, don't forget they will be facing C9 in the semis
Surprised FNC and C9 are getting more votes than RNG. They definitely look like the strongest non-korean team.
I want ssw for more cool skins and seeing more skt skins every year is boring
Puuuuhhhlleeeeasse, let my ONE vote for SSG be true. Knock LZ out of this tournament once and for all. Don't let them come back.

I can't directly say.  I want SKT to win, been a fan since 2013 but I wouldn't be SO upset if LZ won the title.  They're my second favorite currently since I watched them in the LCK.  Gorilla and Pray are a great botlane! Not to mention Khan is awesome!
I agree Lz is probably my second favorite team.

Voting Fnatic here, even if I don't actually think it will happen.  It is my wish though, because after just barely making it out of the Groups stage, that would be quite the underdog story.
That said, I'm a C9 fan, so I kind of want to see them make it, as unlikely as it is.
In reality though, SKT or LZ are the most likely.
I would like to see that happen to or a team maybe other than a Korean one if it is a good underdog story.
man what a heartbreaker for tsm. double life gonna retire now I bet
They we're close if they won he Baron fight they would've probably won the game. However, we have C9
